start_dialogue: ^Halim ah! Can I get some cabbages, please?
^Auntie, you already bought cabbages from me just now, you forgot, ah?
^Really ah? This old brain, playing tricks on me again
^Good thing you got sharp memory, Halim!
^No worries, Auntie. Happens to all of us
^You’re all set for your chicken soup, don’t worry
^Thank you, ah, lucky got you here, Halim
^Otherwise, later I’d end up with cabbages for the whole month!
